segments.text: Zina , can I talk to you about something personal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As long as it doesn't take too long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My boyfriend says I work too much . That I spend more time with you than with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Was he upset when you told him you had to leave this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said not to bother coming back . And I said , fine , I won't .
segments.speaker: S1
